snippet: Daniel Rose, a consultant for Eurostar Diamond Traders, enjoys comparing notes with fellow passengers on the best airlines, seats, aircraft and airports.
abstract: Frequent Flier column features Eurostar Diamond Traders consultant Daniel Rose discussing his flying experiences.
lead_paragraph: Daniel Rose, a consultant for Eurostar Diamond Traders, enjoys comparing notes with fellow passengers on the best airlines, seats, aircraft and airports.

headline.seo: In the Diamond Business, but No Longer Wearing Them
headline.main: In the Diamond Business, but Not Wearing Them
